title: The World's Favorite Spas, Add Your Top Spa
name: The World's Favorite Spas, Add Your Top Spa

properties.name: 1275 E. Red Mountain Circle
properties.description: Posted by Artofthespa   St. George, UtahA spa for adventure and beauty, incredible desert setting. See more of my fave spas at http://spaaroundtheworld.wordpress.com

properties.name: 8882 Moreland Street
properties.description: Posted by Jhallowes  Powell, OH 43065J.Bentley Studio & Spa is a full service hair salon and spa offering only the best in hair, skin, nail and massage services. Also offered are specialty treatments including Hair Extensions, Botox, Teeth Whitening, Accupuncture, a Dry Hydrotherapy Bed and a Vichy Shower. The team provides value-added services which include hot towels, scalp massages, photography, wireless internet, and free babysitting! The 7500 square-foot facility is also home to an event space dedicated to hosting fashion shows and exciting educational events. The strength of the team at J.Bentley is built on education, mutual respect and unfailing devotion to their clients. J.Bentley provides a unique salon and spa experience and is working to change the salon and spa experience as we know it. Experience the difference at J.Bentley Studio & Spa. At J.Bentley, leave the ordinary – discover yourself! ™

properties.name: Geos Spa Sacacomie
properties.description: Posted by Mohsenelgharbi       Geos Spa is a new type of environmentally friendly and energy-efficient spa offering rejuvenating bodywork and therapeutic baths in a natural setting. The concept is based on the responsible use of natural resources, the authenticity of the experience, and a quality of personal care sure to delight each and every visitor.

properties.name: Hanalei Day Spa
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor 5-7132 Kuhio Hwy, Hanalei, HI 96714Amazing abhyanga massage, shirodhara and even Pancha Karma. For a day spa, they can really get to the core! Highly recommend.

properties.name: Kabuki Hotsprings and Spa
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor 1750 Geary Blvd., San Francisco, CAEvery time I\'m in SF, I go here for a morning or rejuvenation. I don\'t indulge in the treatments but purify in their hot pools, cold pool, steam room and sauna. The low lighting, candles and slate make this a remarkable gem. An entire day at a cost of 0.00.

properties.name: Ruby Room
properties.description: Posted by Rubyroom  1743-45 W Division St , Chicago , IL , 60622We opened the ruby red doors in 2002 as a healing sanctuary. As our vision expanded over the years with the creation of our salon, spa, two distinctive boutiques, overnight guest rooms, product line and e-store, it remains (literally & spiritually) the center of everything we stand for and do. The Ruby Room experience is one that unfolds all around you... through every doorway and with every step within our expansive 13,000 square foot space. It enlivens your senses, instills well-being and brings to light your inner bliss. Some people call it magical. We call it The Style of Wellness
